name: THE CITIZEN KANE OF VIDEO GAMES
name_original: THE CITIZEN KANE OF VIDEO GAMES
description:
Memories at once real and imagined!

Experience Citizen Kane as never before!

From the palatial Xanadu to the deathbed of Charles Foster Kane!

Be AMAZED by a SPECTACLE of SIGHT and SOUND and WASD!

Play through Every Single Shot of The Classic Movie!
(for 5 minutes)

At long last! The Citizen Kane of Video Games!!

Art by Liadh Young and Alex Young

Music by Berrnard Hermann

Film by Orson Welles

Game by Llaura


Control with Arrow Keys & SPACE. 

Artist statement-y notes here: https://dreamfeel.itch.io/drea...

"Fifty years later, it is as fresh, as provoking, as entertaining, as funny, as sad, as brilliant as it ever was. Many agree it is the greatest film of all time." -Roger Joseph Ebert

"No one in or out of the field has ever been able to cite a game worthy of comparison with the great poets, filmmakers, novelists and poets... [UNTIL NOW!!]" -Roger Joseph Ebert
